content.question: The facade of Borrominiâ€™s San Carlo alle Quattro Fontane exemplifies Baroque architecture because it includes which of the following characteristic elements?

choices.label: Jamb statues that represent religious figures
Curving elements that create a dynamic design
Columns that appear on two separate levels
Sculptural decorations that are symmetrically organized

content.answer: Curving elements that create a dynamic design

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.1: Cultural Contexts of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
